text: May 14 2015 Silver Standard Announces Election of Directors VANCOUVER, May 14, 2015 /CNW/ -   (NASDAQ: SSRI) (TSX: SSO) ("Silver Standard") announces that the nominees listed in the management proxy circular for the 2015 Annual and Special Meeting of Shareholders were elected as directors of Silver Standard at the Annual Meeting held in Vancouver on Wednesday, May 13, 2015.
